events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I need to request a refund as it does not fit properly and I would like to return it.
The reported issue has been classified under the Refund category based on the customer's request for returning the item and refunding the money.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. who specializes in handling refund requests and return processing.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like to return your jacket and receive a refund. I'm here to help with that.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the item has been used or damaged in any way so we can proceed accordingly?
Thank you for your quick response. My order number is 123456789, and the jacket is brand new, still with tags attached. I just need a refund due to size issues.
We will initiate a return label for you to send the jacket back at no cost. Once we receive it, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving the return label soon.
The return label has been emailed to you. Please check your inbox (and spam folder) for the shipping instructions and label attachment.
Just checking in to confirm you were able to send the jacket back and if you need any further assistance with your refund process.
Yes, I shipped the jacket yesterday. Thank you for following up. I am happy with the service provided.
Your refund has been successfully processed and a confirmation email has been sent. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to appear in your account.
We would love to hear your feedback on how we handled your refund request. A short survey has been sent to your email.
I completed the survey and am very satisfied with the prompt and courteous service I received. Thank you.
This case has been closed based on successful resolution and positive customer feedback. Thank you for contacting support.
